inventory=[{"type": "end_crystal", "quantity": 63, "index": 14}, {"type": "piglin_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 57, "index": 28}, {"type": "iron_nugget", "quantity": 9, "index": 30}, {"type": "glass_bottle", "quantity": 10, "index": 40}]
thought: I need to craft an iron_ingot, which requires 9 iron_nuggets. I will move 1 iron_nugget from slot 30 to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1
